entry.body:
Brainiac is a super special awesome way to express yourself on the web.

When you have a random thought that just isn't cut out for your emo-tastic LiveJournal, or you don't feel like wasting everyone else's time and yours with a random entry on twitter, Brainiac is there to connect just what's on your mind together into a web of interconnected ideas in an effort to defeat that boy scout Kal-El*ahem* to present a creative way to express your ideas that hasn't been done to death with all those trendy web applications everyone and their mother has heard about.

That is, at least for now, before everyone catches on to just how cool this application is so I may collect all the information this planet has to provide and destroy this wretched species!

This here program is made with 90% home-grown PHP and SVG hacking with a little bit of JavaScript on the side. Use of Thickbox and the fancy rich text forms provided by the wonderful FCKEditor prevented this from being 100% home-grown, but we're still damn proud of what we've got.

Brainiac is licensed under the GNU GPL.
